title: 3 bugs with 6.16
body:
1. When a turret is slain (or maybe just first blood turret) it shows a picture of a random champion (usually one from the team who's tower got destroyed), not the champion that actually destroyed the turret, This is actually a 6.15 bug, but doesn't appear to be fixed.

2. Remake Yes/No option does not appear on screen, even though in the chat you are notified that it has activated, (and as such you can not remake)

3. you can no longer select a ward skin in champion select.

replies.body: Good spotting! Go report these bugs on the[ report a bug board ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report)if they haven't already been covered. Make sure to[ follow the guidelines](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/3mQGBEjA-how-to-report-a-game-bug) when doing so ♥

From what I've seen you can sometimes change wards, the remake option needs someone to type /remake to start the visual vote and I don't think riot has noticed the tower thing but yeah it's been weird in games when it says an enemy has destroyed a tower and it shows them killing a champion icon and not a tower icon. Rito please notice Lord Sesshomaru.
